text: Armin Meiwes (born 1 December 1961) is a German man who is known for an act of cannibalism. In March 2001, Meiwes, a then 41-year-old bisexualHorror becomes chic computer technician, placed an advertisement online for a well-built male he could kill and eat. Forty-three year old Bernd-Jurgen Brandes answered the ad later that month. Meiwes took Brandes to his home in Rotenberg. Brandes had sex with Meiwes, then asked Meiwes to cut off his penis. Meiwes did so, then fried the penis, but burned it and fed it to his dog. Meiwes then killed Brandes with Brandes's consent by stabbing him repeatedly in the neck. He cut the body in pieces and froze pieces for later consumption. Meiwes was arrested in December 2002. He had consumed about 20 kg of Brandes' body. Cannibalism was not illegal in Germany until 2001 when Meiwes killed and ate Brandes. Meiwes was convicted of killing by request and defiling a corpse. The Meiwes case was the first cannibalism case in Germany.Cornell University Law School: CannibalismBBC News: German cannibal tells of fantasy In May 2006, a court sentenced Meiwes to life in prison. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Bisexual people Category:Cannibalism Category:German LGBT people Category:German murderers Category:German prisoners Category:People from Essen
